machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;LOAD MATERIAL 2

M572 D0 S{pressure_advance_value} ; set material pressure advance value
G1 X-12.5 Y0 U25 F6000 ; Position for filament change
M83
M581 E1 T2 S-1 C1  ; Disable filament sensor
T0
G1 E25 F{load_speed_1} ; Load stage 1
G1 E500 F{load_speed_2} ; Load stage 2
G1 E100 F{load_speed_3} ; Load stage 3
M104 S{material_print_temperature} T0 ; set extruder temp
G1 E100 F{prime_speed} ; Prime
G1 E{purge_amount} F{purge_speed} ; Purge
M116 ; Wait for temperatures
G1 E1.5 F100 ; Prime
G1 E{switch_extruder_retraction_amount} F{switch_extruder_retraction_speed} ; Retract
;wipe
G1 Y25 X-12.5 F6000
G1 Y60 F12000
G1 Y25 F12000
G1 Y60 F12000

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
;UNLOAD MATERIAL 2

M581 E1 T2 S-1 C1 ; Disable filament sensor
T0
M913 E100
M83
G1 X-13.5 Y0 F6000
G1 E{ramming_distance_1} F{ramming_speed_1} ; Ramming stage 1
G1 E{ramming_distance_2} F{ramming_speed_2} ; Ramming stage 2
G1 E{ramming_distance_3} F{ramming_speed_3} ; Ramming stage 3
G1 E{ramming_distance_4} F{ramming_speed_4} ; Ramming stage 4
G1 E{ramming_distance_5} F{ramming_speed_5} ; Ramming stage 5
G1 E{ramming_distance_6} F{ramming_speed_6} ; Ramming stage 6
G1 E-15 F{unload_speed_1} ; Unload stage 1
G1 E-14 F{unload_speed_2} ; Unload stage 2
G1 E-4 F600
G1 E-2 F360
G1 E{cool_distance_1} F{cool_speed_f} ; Cool move 1 forward
G1 E-{cool_distance_1} F{cool_speed_b} ; Cool move 1 backward
G1 E{cool_distance_2} F{cool_speed_f} ; Cool move 2 forward
G1 E-{cool_distance_2} F{cool_speed_b} ; Cool move 2 backward
G1 E-87 F{unload_speed_3} ; Unload stage 3
G1 F{unload_speed_4} ; Unload stage 4 feedrate
M98 P/sys/unloadlength.g ; Unload stage 4 distance
G1 E-30 F{unload_speed_5} ; Unload stage 5
M98 P/sys/filamentcut.g ; exicute filament cut
